STORYGAME STUDIOS’ FIRST INTERACTIVE THRILLER

  • RIVETING IMMERSIVE STORYTELLING
  • ENGAGE WITH CHARACTERS TO UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY
  • COUCH CO-OP GAMEPLAY FOR 1 to 4 PLAYERS
“An engrossing, crime thriller that throws you head-first down the rabbit hole.”

LAVERNA PARK

An intense, player driven narrative awaits!

An ambitious journalist gets the opportunity of a lifetime when they’re contacted by a high-profile team of investigative journalists to track down a missing scientific researcher.

The researcher was working on something big before he disappeared – the international pharma company he worked for is scrambling to track him down, as are foreign and domestic security forces.

Questions start to multiply and things quickly get intense. It’ll be up to the journalist to break this story and find out the truth – something bigger and more unexpected than anyone thought.

And that journalist is YOU!

An all-encompassing experience.

We bring together the best of binge-worthy TV and engaging interactive gameplay. If you love a gripping crime thriller or mystery, and love solving the case, you will love a story game!

Every story game is a unique and enthralling experience

  • Crafted to entangle you in an intricate web of intrigue.

  • Put your intellect and gut instinct to the test.

  • Interact with characters to crack the case.

  • “This idea will take streaming episodic TV to a new level.” - Kim K.
  • “Perfect for a dinner night with friends.” – Raj S.
  • “We loved the test concept and can’t wait for the real thing.” – Chris T.

StoryGame Studios is a Toronto-based entertainment start-up that creates and produces narrative-driven digital game experiences. The company was founded in 2020 by John Lacey, Michael Shearer and Cam Wykes.
For Investor Relations and Media Inquiries, please connect here.

A special thank you to everyone who brought their unique talents and passion together to help bring this exciting project to life!
